snippet.title: Metroid Dread - Overview Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Samus Aran is the galaxy’s most legendary bounty hunter, but soon she’ll begin a mission unlike any other she’s completed before.

Here’s everything you need to know as you prepare to face the dread, new enemies, and escape Planet ZDR. 

The Metroid Dread game is available on October 8, 2021 only for the Nintendo Switch family of systems.

Pre-order today: https://metroid.nintendo.com/#buy

Learn more about Samus' latest adventure—and take a look behind the scenes with the developers—by visiting https://metroid.nintendo.com/news/Sub... for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/
